Regulation Name(s): Neisseria spp. direct serological test reagents
Microbiological specimen collection and transport device
Specimen Container(s): Abbott multi-Collect Specimen Collection Kit transport tube with buffer
Individually packaged sterile specimen collection swab
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Abbott RealTime CT/NG assay and Abbott multi-Collect Specimen Collection Kit for qualitative detection of Chlamydia trachomatis and Neisseria gonorrhoeae DNA from swab and urine specimens
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro real-time PCR assay for qualitative detection of Chlamydia trachomatis and Neisseria gonorrhoeae DNA in endocervical, vaginal, urethral swab, and urine specimens, with corresponding specimen collection kit for collection and transportation; not intended for home use
